summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of BGV Report Generator app. All major features working correctly including multi-step form navigation, mock data pre-filling, GPS coordinates, file upload sections with watermark mentions, executive summary, and PDF generation.

ui_bugs.issue: Address textarea shows 'None' instead of pre-filled mock address data
Download button remains enabled even when candidate name is cleared (should be disabled)

passed_tests: Multi-step form navigation (5 steps) with Next/Back buttons
Sidebar navigation to jump between steps
Mock data pre-filling in Step 1 (except address field)
Education verification form with file upload and stamp label
Employment verification form with file upload and stamp label
Address verification with GPS Coordinates section (Latitude, Longitude, Pincode)
GPS watermark mention in address file upload
Executive summary with verification statuses and status badges
Auto-generated case numbers and calculated dates
Form field interactions and dropdown selections
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix address field pre-filling issue in Step 1 and improve PDF download button validation to properly disable when candidate name is empty
